mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.ANUAL_NET_INCOME as anualNetIncome, a.NET_ASSET_VALUE as netAssetValue, a.NET_CURRENT_ASSETS as netCurrentAssets, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ANUAL_NET_INCOME , NET_ASSET_VALUE , NET_CURRENT_ASSETS , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{anualNetIncome} , #{netAssetValue} , #{netCurrentAssets} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
ANUAL_NET_INCOME ,
NET_ASSET_VALUE ,
NET_CURRENT_ASSETS ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{anualNetIncome} ,
#{netAssetValue} ,
#{netCurrentAssets} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
ANUAL_NET_INCOME = #{anualNetIncome} ,
NET_ASSET_VALUE = #{netAssetValue} ,
NET_CURRENT_ASSETS = #{netCurrentAssets} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , ANUAL_NET_INCOME , NET_ASSET_VALUE , NET_CURRENT_ASSETS , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.anualNetIncome} , #{item.netAssetValue} , #{item.netCurrentAssets} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , ANUAL_NET_INCOME = #{item.anualNetIncome} , NET_ASSET_VALUE = #{item.netAssetValue} , NET_CURRENT_ASSETS = #{item.netCurrentAssets} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , ANUAL_NET_INCOME = #{anualNetIncome} , NET_ASSET_VALUE = #{netAssetValue} , NET_CURRENT_ASSETS = #{netCurrentAssets} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_PER_ASSET a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
